channel.title: Acoustic Fuel
channel.description: In each episode we use music to guide you to one of our 5 mood enhancing destinations: A Calm Place, Stimulation Station, Creative Commons, On Top Of The World, or Utopia. All to improve your mood without any harmful side effects.
channel.itunes:author: Acoustic Fuel
channel.itunes:summary: In each episode we use music to guide you to one of our 5 mood enhancing destinations: A Calm Place, Stimulation Station, Creative Commons, On Top Of The World, or Utopia. All designed to improve your mood without any harmful side effects.

item.title: Acoustic Fuel w/ Richard Mecdeci and I to I Ministries
item.description:
This week we are going to visit On Top Of The World with Richard Mekdeci and I to I (Eye to Eye) Ministries.
A little spill on our part we mentioned that I to I ministires website was itoiministries.com. The correct address is itoiministries.org
item.itunes:author: Acoustic Fuel
item.itunes:summary:
This week we are going to visit On Top Of The World with Richard Mekdeci and I to I (Eye to Eye) Ministries.
A little spill on our part we mentioned that I to I ministires website was itoiministries.com. The correct address is itoiministries.org

item.title: Acoustic Fuel w/ Greg Smith
item.description: This time around we are going to take you to Creative Commons with Greg Smith and his song "Forties". You can learn more about Greg Smith at www.gregsmithguitar.com.
item.itunes:author: Acoustic Fuel
item.itunes:summary: This time around we are going to take you to Creative Commons with Greg Smith and his song "Forties". You can learn more about Greg Smith at www.gregsmithguitar.com.

item.title: Acoustic Fuel w/Jan Linder Koda
item.description: Welcome to Acoustic Fuel where you will find audio that takes you where you want to go. And this week we are going to take you to Utopia with Jan Linder Koda. You can learn more about her are angeldivamusic.com.
item.itunes:author: Acoustic Fuel
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Acoustic Fuel where you will find audio that takes you where you want to go. And this week we are going to take you to Utopia with Jan Linder Koda. You can learn more about her are angeldivamusic.com.

item.title: Acoustic Fuel w/ Eliot Popkin Pt.2
item.description: Yes! We are back and filling you up with audio that takes you where you want to go. In this episode we are going to take you to the Top Of The World with part 2 of our interview with singer song/songwriter Eliot Popkin and his song "Soar".
item.itunes:author: Acoustic Fuel
item.itunes:summary: Yes! We are back and filling you up with audio that takes you where you want to go. In this episode we are going to take you to the Top Of The World with part 2 of our interview with singer song/songwriter Eliot Popkin and his song "Soar".

item.title: Acoustic Fuel - On Top Of The World w/ Eliot Popkin
item.description:
Acoustic Fuel - Audio that takes you where you want to go. We use audio to guide you to one of our 5 mood enhancing destinations. In this edition, we are going to put you On Top Of The World with the first part of a two part series featuring one of our favorites Eliot Popkin and his song "I Don't Wanna".
Don't forget to enter to win you very own "I Don't Wanna" Tee Shirt. Just visit www.acousticfuel.com and type in free tee shirt in the search box to access the entry form.
